definition: variant of 窪|洼[wa1]/(used in names)
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

definition: veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
